plot: After deciding he's the least valuable member of the team, Sokka seeks an apprenticeship with a sword-master. The rest of the gang tries to adjust to being without him. The imprisoned Iroh may not be as beaten as he seems.

Sokka feels like he is useless, he decides to take up swordsmanship from a legendary sword master, Piandao. Sokka decides to make his own sword from a meteorite he has found. Piandao challenges Sokka to a duel and he believes Sokka is a worthy swordsman. Piandao reveals to Team Avatar that the way of the sword belongs to the four nations, not to one nation. Meanwhile, in prison, Iroh decides to body build in secret in order to escape.—dawsonpersi
